definition: extremely large, a caretaker for an apartment house, to an extreme degree
details:
adjective
- extremely large
= example: extremely large
- of the highest quality
= synonyms: first-rate, tiptop, topnotch, top-notch, tops, ace, A-one, crack
- including more than a specified category
= example: including more than a specified category
noun
- a caretaker for an apartment house
= synonyms: superintendent
adverb
- to an extreme degree
= synonyms: passing
